Html:
Hi,

I try to adjust the size of the border but it's not indicate in the documentation (there are only style & color).


Please, tell me that it is possible :(

border sizes include PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_HAIR, PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_THICK, PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_MEDIUM, PHPExcel_Style_Border::BORDER_THIN.... those are the only size stylings defined for Excel borders. You can find the full set of styles and thicknesses listed as constants in PHPExcel/Style/Border.php
